# stride

**Instance Property**

The number of bytes from one buffer entry to the next.

## Declaration

```swift
var stride: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `1`. See [https://developer.apple.com/metal/Metal-Feature-Set-Tables.pdf] for `stride` alignment restrictions on GPU architectures.

## Describing fetch behavior

- **stepFunction**: Determines how and when compute functions fetch data.
- **stepRate**: How frequently the step function should load data.
- **MTLStepFunction**: The frequency and locations at which a function fetches attribute data.
